column5: Hey fellas i just wanted to know how the fishing in this area was, has anyone ever fished here. If so any success ? what baits, lures, rigs. The species that were caught.  Thanks again, i am just googling random places and posting questions lol.  How about Marie Curtis is there any good fishign to be had there ? if so what exactly can a guy get into ?

not trying to sound like an   but the best bet is to go find out for yourself .. I have found many places to fish by using google earth but would never post it here .. too many lurkers lookin for a spot to fish
Good point, alas the lurkers...well like everyone says not lookin for ur hotspot just wanan know whats in there

Shipyard Park itself now has boats moored all along the edge of it. I'm pretty sure that, like the other side of the creek, it's no fishing from May to November. You can fish the harbour further down though.
